definition: the organized work of a religious missionary
details:
noun
- the organized work of a religious missionary
= synonyms: missionary work
- a special assignment that is given to a person or group
= example: a special assignment that is given to a person or group
= synonyms: charge, commission
- an operation that is assigned by a higher headquarters
= example: an operation that is assigned by a higher headquarters
= synonyms: military mission
- a group of representatives or delegates
= synonyms: delegacy
- an organization of missionaries in a foreign land sent to carry on religious work
= synonyms: foreign mission
